model

Class StrategoModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.StrategoModel

  • public class StrategoModel
extends java.util.Observable
    Model for the Stratego game. Holds a representation of the game board including the game pieces and their locations, and provides various methods for interacting with the pieces and the board.
    Author:
    Jesse Chen, Parker Jones, Emily Pencek, Yosef Jacobson

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        private int getIndex(Loc loc)

      • inBounds

        public boolean inBounds(Loc loc)
        Checks @param loc to see if it represents a valid location on the board
        Parameters:
        loc - Location input.
        Returns:
        true if loc is valid, else false

      • setPiece

        public StrategoPieceUpdate setPiece(Piece piece,
                                    Loc loc)
        Changes the piece inside the tile at the specified coordinate.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to be set
        loc - The location where piece is to be set
        Returns:
        message The piece update message caused by setting this piece, or null if at least one of the parameters is invalid.

      • processUpdate

        public void processUpdate(StrategoMessage msg)
        Apply the changes from a piece update message to this model.
        Parameters:
        msg - Piece update message generated by setPiece(Piece, Loc)

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece(Loc loc)
        Gets the Piece object at the location specified by the Loc object.
        Parameters:
        loc - The Loc object that specifies the coordinates.
        Returns:
        the Piece object at the location specified by the Loc object

      • removePiece

        public void removePiece(Loc loc)
        Deletes the piece inside the box at the specified coordinate.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location of piece to remove.

      • removePiece

        public void removePiece(Piece piece)
        Deletes the piece from the board.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to remove.

      • reveal

        public void reveal(Piece p1,
                   Piece p2,
                   boolean tie)
        Reveals the pieces @param p1 and @param p2, making each piece visible to the other player.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Piece 1 to reveal
        p2 - Piece 2 to reveal
        tie - True if the pieces are equal, false if not.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver(boolean team)
        Checks if @param team has lost the game by iterating over the board and checking what pieces they have.
        Parameters:
        team - False for red, true for blue.
        Returns:
        true if team no longer has their flag or any movable pieces, else false
